title: Crew Show!
description: This week Matt Farah, Zack Klapman and Chris Hayes catch up on the news and press cars.  Notably we discuss Matt LeBlanc joining the Top Gear cast, Matt and Zack share their experience with the ATS-V Coupe, and we talk about what dictates a V6 exhaust note. Additionally Matt dynos the Mustang, takes a G500 off road and spends some time in a Porsche 928.
author: matt@thesmokingtire.com (Matt Farah & Zack Klapman)

Additionally Matt dynos the Mustang, takes a G500 off road and spends some time in a Porsche 928.
